title: Bloomberg Westminster: Sexual Misconduct
itunes:title: Bloomberg Westminster: Sexual Misconduct
description:
The Conservatives see another scandal and the resignation of MP Neil Parish. We revisit our best interviews with MPs Tim Farron, Liberal Democrat; Nigel Mills, Conservative; Helen Hayes, Labour and Crispin Blunt, Conservative. Hosted by Bloomberg's Caroline Hepker.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
